title: Venison pasties
ingredients: ['55g butter', '2 onions, finely chopped', '2 carrots, peeled and chopped', '2 potatoes, diced', '500ml red wine', '300ml chicken stock', '2 tablespoons tomato puree', '1 bay leaf', '1 sprig fresh rosemary', '1 sprig fresh thyme', '1.35kg venison steak, diced', '1 packet puff pastry']
